title: Cramps Cost McNulty Chance at Win in Sizzling 2024 Season Debut: ‘These Things Can Happen in First Race Back’
content:
Simon Carr blazes to victory at Trofeo Calvià to give EF Education-EasyPost big win in men's European season opener.

Read the full article at Cramps Cost McNulty Chance at Win in Sizzling 2024 Season Debut: ‘These Things Can Happen in First Race Back’ on Velo.
author: ahood
